name: Capella's Promise
description:
In a far-off corner of the land of Ilnacia, siblings Velk and Thiana run an underground slave market.
One rainy night, a customer arrives with an unusual request: for the two to take a girl into their care for six months.
Offered a large sum, Thiana accepts without a second thought. But great danger looms on the horizon...

Capella's Promise is a JRPG made by PlainSoft in RPG Maker VX Ace. It has a main plot about 20 to 30 hours long with optional sidequests and many other gameplay features, including:

  • The Specialize system, where SP won from battles can be used to level up Specialties and learn moves or passive skills.
  • An item synthesis system, where you can use raw materials to create anything you have the recipe for.
  • Fully-randomized equipment dropped by enemies, as well as fixed equipment from shops and the like.
  • A fortification system of embedding Orbs into equipment to grant it additional properties and stat boosts.
